contents.item: Relationships are built in the silences.
contents.owner: Trevor Noah, Born a Crime: Stories From a South African Childhood

contents.item: Someone could save your life without you ever knowing it. It happened more than most people realized.
contents.owner: J. Courtney Sullivan, Saints for All Occasions

contents.item: I don't get it, guys, I continued. I'd want to date me. Why is it so hard for me? I'm wicked fun, I dress nicely, I'm friendly... I'd love to date me. Wouldn't you?
contents.owner: Kristan Higgins, All I Ever Wanted

contents.item: The more opposite to you, the more challenging your partner is to you. This person holds the key to all your lost parts.
contents.owner: Adele Green in Can You See Me Naked: Grow in a conscious relationship

contents.item: Most things are relative, but perspective is everything.
contents.owner: Adele Green in Can You See Me Naked: Grow in a conscious relationship

contents.item: It is not about the person who is right for you, but when you are ready to experience who you are through another.
contents.owner: Adele Green in Can You See Me Naked: Grow in a conscious relationship

contents.item: Does your partner represent God on earth for you?
contents.owner: Adele Green in Can You See Me Naked: Grow in a conscious relationship

contents.item: He hadn't known her, didn't know her, of course. There wasn't the time.
contents.owner: Alexander Freed, Rogue One - A Star Wars Story

contents.item: Calling bullshit on something thats exactly what you want to hear is certainly among life's bigger challenges
contents.owner: Sara Eckel, It's Not You: 27 (Wrong) Reasons You're Single

contents.item: There is no such thing as relationships in this world. It is really a self-created net. Do these cows-buffalos have any relationships? They don’t have a mother-in-law, no father-in-law...
contents.owner: Dada Bhagwan

contents.item: People with Sweet Relationships [those favoring you, always talk good] with you, will make you stumble.
contents.owner: Dada Bhagwan

contents.item: Do not respond to people being upset by confidently giving them advice on how to solve their problems
contents.owner: Ezra Klein

contents.item: Positive relationships are those that leave you feeling energized after contact with a person. Even if the topic is unpleasant, the interaction itself leaves you with more energy.
contents.owner: Elaine Seat, Playbook for Your Extraordinary Life: A Practical Guide to a Remarkable Life

contents.item: Never end the relationship when emotionally charged.
contents.owner: Latika Teotia

contents.item: I grew up with a front-row seat to what a happy, healthy marriage looks like. Never perfect, constantly evolving, always united.
contents.owner: Shonda Rhimes, Year of Yes: How to Dance It Out, Stand In the Sun and Be Your Own Person

contents.item: If you closely scrutinize relationships everywhere that struggle, in most cases, it is due to lack of self-awareness of one or both parties...
contents.owner: Assegid Habtewold, The 9 Cardinal Building Blocks: For Continued Success in Leadership

contents.item: I just don't have a tremendously strong belief that relationships can work. I'm really quite convinced that they don't. And if they do, it's really quite terribly brief and sporadic.
contents.owner: Morrissey

contents.item: Quit trying to change others. You haven’t done such a great job on yourself – yet.
contents.owner: Mensah Oteh

contents.item: be waryof the boys whoonly ever tellhalf-thruthsbecause theywill only ever be half in lovewith you-slay those dragons
contents.owner: Amanda Lovelace, The Princess Saves Herself in this One

contents.item: ...people cannot and do not want to live unrelated to others.
contents.owner: Herman L Glaess, Potentiality Enhancement Programs
